0.mnemonics_value: The soldier lay in the grass (艹), guarding the cliff (厂) with one (一) spear (戈) and staring with wide eyes (罒) full of CONTEMPT. His wife had packed him three blueberry sherBETS (ベツ) for lunch.

0.footnotes_value:
鹿 (2025: deer; radical 198: "deer")

林 (75: grove)
0.meaning_value: FOOT OF A MOUNTAIN
0.mnemonics_value: Blue-haired ROCKy (ロク) found many deer (鹿) in the grove (林) at the FOOT OF A MOUNTAIN.

0.footnotes_value:
丰, take as "utility pole"

夂 (foot; radical 34: "winter"), take as "cross-legged"

虫 (56: insect; radical 142: "insect")
0.mnemonics_value: Blue-haired HOmer (ホウ) climbs up on a utility pole (丰) and sits there cross-legged (夂), hoping to escape a swarm of insects (虫), possibly BEES or WASPS.

0.footnotes_value:
豸 (radical 153: "badger")

白 (65: white; radical 106: "white")

儿 (radical 10: "legs")
0.mnemonics_value: A badger (豸) came out of the woods. His APPEARANCE was so similar to that of a skunk that blue-haired BO's (ボウ) face turned white (白) and her legs (儿) trembled.

0.footnotes_value:
夾 (insert between), take as "scissors"

頁 (radical 181: "big shell"), take as "head"
0.mnemonics_value: HOly (ほお) cow! The Joker from Batman has taken scissors (夾) and cut his CHEEKS to have a permanent evil smile. He is not right in the head (頁)!

0.footnotes_value:
月/肉 (radical 130: "flesh")

力 (74: strength; radical 19: "strong")
0.meaning_value: SIDE; aside; ARMPIT; secondary
0.mnemonics_value: She heard over the blue WALKIE (わき)-talkie that she had won an award for doing an ARMPIT hold while pole dancing. She was built perfectly for it, having ample flesh (月) on the SIDE of her body and three times the strength (力) of the other contestants.

0.footnotes_value:
十 (33: ten; radical 24: "cross")

子 (25: child; radical 39: "child")

力 (74: strength; radical 19: "strong")

冖 (to cover; radical 14: "katakana wa")
0.mnemonics_value: A group of pranksters, 10 (十) children (子) strong (力), tried to steal the principal's blue BOATS (ボツ) under the cover (冖) of night, but the SUDDEN RISE of the full moon exposed them to onlookers.

0.footnotes_value:
日 (62: day; radical 72: "sun")

未 (794: not yet)
0.mnemonics_value: Blue-haired MIchael (マイ) noticed that although the sun (日) had not yet (未) set, it had become too DIM to read at his park bench.

0.footnotes_value:
冘, take as "guy on crutches"

木 (69: tree; radical 75: "tree")
0.mnemonics_value: The guy on crutches (冘) places his PILLOW against a big tree (木) and watches little blue-haired MARK RUn (まくら).

0.footnotes_value:
虫 (56: insect; radical 142: "insect")

必 (568: invariably)

宀 (radical 40: "katakana u"), take as "house"
0.mnemonics_value: Lots of insects (虫), mainly bees, invariably (必) swarm around the beehive in his house (宀). To collect HONEY without getting stung, he always wears blue oven MITTS (ミツ).

0.footnotes_value:
日 (62: Sunday; radical 72: "sun")

冖 (to cover; radical 14: "katakana wa")

六 (76: six)
0.mnemonics_value: On Sunday (日) they waited until it was DARK, then covered (冖) the six (六) blue MAIlboxes (メイ) in the village with symbols of the REALM OF THE DEAD.

0.footnotes_value:
夂 (foot; radical 34: "winter")

, take as twist on 生 (42: raw; radical 100: "birth")

面 (395: face; radical 176: "face")

Alternate interpretation: 麦 (194: wheat; radical 199: "wheat")
0.mnemonics_value: In the winter (夂) his mother serves raMEN (メン) in blue bowls with lots of thick NOODLES and places raw () carrots on top so they form a funny face (面).

0.footnotes_value:
台 (166: a stand)

冫 (radical 15: "ice")
0.mnemonics_value: A stand (台) made of ( ice (冫) is useless for WORKING METALS, blue-haired JAroslav (ヤ) discovered. It just melts.

0.footnotes_value:
弓 (836: bow; radical 57: "bow")

, take as twist on 人 (39: person; radical 9: "person")

小 (36: small; radical 42: "little")
0.mnemonics_value: The archery bow (弓) was way too big for a person () as small (小) as blue-haired MaYA (や), but she became INCREASINGLY adept at holding it.

0.footnotes_value:
音 (6: sound; radical 180: "sound")

門 (211: gate; radical 169: "gate")
0.mnemonics_value: It was already DARK outside when blue-haired YAMI (やみ) heard strange sounds (音) at the gate (門).

0.footnotes_value:
口 (20: mouth; radical 30: "mouth")

, take as "meeting hall"

巜, take as "knives"

月/肉 (radical 130: "flesh"), take as "meat"
0.mnemonics_value: Blue-haired YUri (ユ) has a good METAPHOR for a mouth (口). He says it resembles a meeting hall () full of butchers, men with knives (巜) who cut meat (月).

0.footnotes_value:
王 (5: king; radical 96: "jewel")

廾 (to offer; radical 55: "letter H"), take as "thorns"
0.mnemonics_value: The king (王) was RIDICULED because he PLAYED WITH a blue ROse (ロウ) and was pricked by thorns (廾).

2124.eng_meaning_0: to well (up), spring forth, gush out; come out of nowhere; to form

0.footnotes_value:
勇 (592: brave)

氵 is a variant of 水 (radical 85: "water")
0.meaning_value: to well (up), spring forth, GUSH OUT; come out of nowhere; to form
0.mnemonics_value: Weak from thirst, blue-haired YUmi (ユウ) kept digging bravely (勇) until water (氵) GUSHED OUT from an underground spring.

0.footnotes_value:
女 (35: woman; radical 38: "woman")

大 (53: big; radical 37: "big")

丿 (radical 4: "katakana no"), take as "log"
0.mnemonics_value: A woman (女) in our neighborhood is really WEIRD. She carries around a big (大) log (丿) and YOdels (ヨウ) all day.

0.footnotes_value:
勿 (not), take as "rays"

旦 (2063: daybreak)

疒 (radical 104: "sickness")
0.mnemonics_value: She wanted to YOdel (ヨウ) at the first rays (勿) of daybreak (旦), but an unknown sickness (疒) had caused a SWELLING in her throat.

0.footnotes_value:
夭, take as twist on 天 (58: weather)

氵 is a variant of 水 (radical 85: "water")
0.mnemonics_value: In good weather (夭) he adds water (氵) and blueberry YOGUrt (ヨク) to his vegetable patches to make them FERTILE.

2128.eng_meaning_0: to abduct; pull; crush; ラ sound

0.footnotes_value:
扌 is a variant of 手 (radical 64: "hand")

立 (73: to stand; radical 117: "standing"), take as "jar"
0.meaning_value: to abduct; PULL; CRUSH; ラ sound
0.mnemonics_value: Blue-haired RAfael (ラ) quickly PULLED his hand (扌) out of the jar (立). He hoped no one noticed that he was trying to steal cookies, although he CRUSHED one in the process.

0.footnotes_value:
束 (1535: bundle)

辛 (1432: spicy; radical 160: "bitter")
0.mnemonics_value: I used blue-haired KonRAD'S (ラツ) bundle (束) of spices (辛) to make the food SPICIER.

0.footnotes_value:
監 (1111: to supervise)

艹 (radical 140: "grass"), take as "plants"
0.mnemonics_value: He is supervising (監) the removal of the blue cormoRANt (ラン) eggs they found amid the INDIGO plants (艹).

0.footnotes_value:
王 (5: king; radical 96: "jewel")

㐫, take as "lidded box with ornaments"

禸, take as "long-legged insect," a twist on 虫 (56: insect; radical 142: "insect")
0.mnemonics_value: She handed the king (王) a lidded box with ornaments (㐫). Decorated with a blue RIbbon (リ), the box contained a precious piece of LAPIS LAZULI. With horror she noticed a long-legged insect (禸) clinging to the bottom of the gift.

0.footnotes_value:
覀 is a variant of 西 (152: west; radical 146: "west")

忄, take as "to feel," is a variant of 心 (radical 61: "heart")

木 (69: tree; radical 75: "tree")
0.mnemonics_value: The two blue-haired culpRITS (リツ) approached the nursery from the west (覀). With a racing heart (忄) and TREMBLING hands the owner handed over the rare bonsai tree (木).

0.footnotes_value:
亻 is a variant of 人 (39: person; radical 9: "person")

呂 (2136: ロ sound)
0.mnemonics_value: The parents hired a dubious person (亻) as a COMPANION for their little boy. He is to give the kid a small blueberry from RIO (リョ) de Janeiro every time the child gets the ロ sound (呂) right.

0.footnotes_value:
目 (72: eye; radical 109: "eye")

小 (36: young; radical 42: "little")

日 (62: day; radical 72: "sun")

, take as "tent"
0.mnemonics_value: Seeing with my own eyes (目) how the young (小) boys enjoyed running around all day (日) in the woods, sleeping in tents (), and eating blueberries from RIO (リヨウ) de Janeiro for breakfast, I feel it is OBVIOUS that this camp contributes to their well-being.

0.footnotes_value:
王 (5: king; radical 96: "jewel")

留 (805: stay)
0.mnemonics_value: The king (王) persuaded the gem expert, blue-haired RUdolph (ル), to stay (留) in the kingdom by giving him a beautiful LAPIS LAZULI.

0.footnotes_value:
丿 (radical 4: "katakana no"), take as "walkway"

口 (20: mouth; radical 30: "mouth"), take as "room"
0.mnemonics_value: Little blue-eyed ROnan (ロ) calls the walkway (丿) between the rooms (口) a road. He runs along, practicing the ロ SOUND by singing "Ro, ro, ro, road!"
